scripts.start: unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && npx @electron/rebuild -f -w node-pty && electron .
scripts.test: npm run test:jest && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:jest: npm run test:jest:prod && npm run test:jest:mock
scripts.test:jest:prod: unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && jest --config=jest.config.js
scripts.test:jest:mock: unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && jest --config=jest.config.mock.js
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && E2E_ENV=prod npx playwright test --reporter=list
scripts.test:e2e:report: npm run build && unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && E2E_ENV=prod npx playwright test
